metadata.h1: Olive Garden Nutrition, Allergen Menu & Gluten-Free Options 2025
metadata.description: Find detailed nutrition and allergen information for the Olive Garden menu. Make informed choices with our complete guide to calories, fat, carbs, and gluten-free options.

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Olive Garden is known for its creamy pastas, endless breadsticks, and fresh salads from their complete menu. But if olive garden nutrition, the Olive Garden allergen menu, or Olive Garden gluten-free menu matter to you, knowing what’s on your plate is key.

items.question: Does Olive Garden offer a gluten-free menu?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden provides a gluten-sensitive menu featuring items like Gluten-Free Rotini with Marinara or Meat Sauce, Herb-Grilled Salmon, and the Famous House Salad without croutons.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have an allergen menu?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden offers an Allergen Guide that details which menu items contain common allergens like dairy, nuts, shellfish, and more. This guide helps guests make informed dining choices based on their dietary needs.
